claim: Flublok contains 45 micrograms (mcg) of HA per strain vs 15 mcg of HA per strain in a standard-dose influenza vaccine.

verified_evidence.quote: acell culture based influenza vaccine (Flucelvax Quadrivalent by Seqirus, Inc., ccIIV4) and a recombinant influenza vaccine (Flublok Quadrivalent by Sanofi Pasteur, RIV4). RIV4 contains 3 times the i d 45 HA/d / ...d
verified_evidence.explanation: The quote directly supports the claim by stating that Flublok Quadrivalent (RIV4) contains 3 times the amount of HA per dose compared to standard-dose vaccines, and references the 45 HA/d (interpreted as 45 micrograms HA per dose per strain). This matches the claim that Flublok contains 45 mcg of HA per strain versus 15 mcg in standard-dose vaccines. The document does not provide the full sentence, but the key facts and numbers are present and unambiguous.
